verses.verse: וַתִּקְרַ֜בְנָה <S%H7126><s%> Then came בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> the daughters צְלָפְחָ֗ד <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son חֵ֤פֶר <S%H2660><s%> of Hepher בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son גִּלְעָד֙ <S%H1568><s%> of Gilead בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מָכִ֣יר <S%H4353><s%> of Machir בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh לְמִשְׁפְּחֹ֖ת <S%H4940><s%> of the families מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> of Manasseh בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יוֹסֵ֑ף <S%H3130><s%> of Joseph וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> and these שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> and these [are] the names בְּנֹתָ֔יו <S%H1323><s%> of his daughters מַחְלָ֣ה <S%H4244><s%> Mahlah נֹעָ֔ה <S%H5270><s%> Noah וְחָגְלָ֥ה <S%H2295><s%> and Hoglah וּמִלְכָּ֖ה <S%H4435><s%> and Milcah וְתִרְצָֽה׃ <S%H8656><s%> and Tirzah

וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֜דְנָה <S%H5975><s%> And they stood לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses וְלִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> and before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> and before הַנְּשִׂיאִ֖ם <S%H5387><s%> the princes וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all הָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> and all the congregation פֶּ֥תַח <S%H6607><s%> [by] the door אֹֽהֶל־ <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

אָבִינוּ֮ <S%H1><s%> Our father מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> died בַּמִּדְבָּר֒ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness וְה֨וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָיָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> had בְּת֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> and he was not in הָעֵדָ֗ה <S%H5712><s%> the company הַנּוֹעָדִ֛ים <S%H3259><s%> of them that gathered themselves together עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> against the LORD בַּעֲדַת־ <S%H5712><s%> in the company קֹ֑רַח <S%H7141><s%> of Korah כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for בְחֶטְא֣וֹ <S%H2399><s%> in his own sin מֵ֔ת <S%H4191><s%> but died וּבָנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> and had no sons לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no הָ֥יוּ <S%H1961><s%> had לֽוֹ׃

לָ֣מָּה <S%H4100><s%> Why יִגָּרַ֤ע <S%H1639><s%> be done away שֵׁם־ <S%H8034><s%> Why should the name אָבִ֙ינוּ֙ <S%H1><s%> of our father מִתּ֣וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> from among מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֔וֹ <S%H4940><s%> his family כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> because אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> had ל֖וֹ בֵּ֑ן <S%H1121><s%> afflicted תְּנָה־ <S%H5414><s%> add לָּ֣נוּ אֲחֻזָּ֔ה <S%H272><s%> unto us [therefore] a possession בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲחֵ֥י <S%H251><s%> the brethren אָבִֽינוּ׃ <S%H1><s%> of our father
;וַיַּקְרֵ֥ב <S%H7126><s%> brought מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מִשְׁפָּטָ֖ן <S%H4941><s%> their cause לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD ס
וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

כֵּ֗ן <S%H3651><s%> right בְּנ֣וֹת <S%H1323><s%> The daughters צְלָפְחָד֮ <S%H6765><s%> of Zelophehad דֹּבְרֹת֒ <S%H1696><s%> speak נָתֹ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> thou shalt surely תִּתֵּ֤ן <S%H5414><s%> give לָהֶם֙ אֲחֻזַּ֣ת <S%H272><s%> them a possession נַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> of an inheritance בְּת֖וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> among אֲחֵ֣י <S%H251><s%> brethren אֲבִיהֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> their father's וְהַֽעֲבַרְתָּ֛ <S%H5674><s%> to pass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלַ֥ת <S%H5159><s%> and thou shalt cause the inheritance אֲבִיהֶ֖ן <S%H1><s%> of their father לָהֶֽן׃

וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel תְּדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> And thou shalt speak לֵאמֹ֑ר <S%H559><s%> saying אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> If a man כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> If יָמ֗וּת <S%H4191><s%> die וּבֵן֙ <S%H1121><s%> and have no son אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> and has ל֔וֹ וְהַֽעֲבַרְתֶּ֥ם <S%H5674><s%> to pass אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> then ye shall cause his inheritance לְבִתּֽוֹ׃ <S%H1323><s%> unto his daughter

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has ל֖וֹ בַּ֑ת <S%H1323><s%> And if he have no daughter וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> then ye shall give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance לְאֶחָיו׃ <S%H251><s%> unto his brethren

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> has ל֖וֹ אַחִ֑ים <S%H251><s%> And if he have no brethren וּנְתַתֶּ֥ם <S%H5414><s%> then ye shall give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֖וֹ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance לַאֲחֵ֥י <S%H251><s%> brethren אָבִֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> unto his father's

וְאִם־ <S%H518><s%> If אֵ֣ין <S%H369><s%> has אַחִים֮ <S%H251><s%> have no brethren לְאָבִיו֒ <S%H1><s%> And if his father וּנְתַתֶּ֣ם <S%H5414><s%> then ye shall give אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> נַחֲלָת֗וֹ <S%H5159><s%> his inheritance לִשְׁאֵר֞וֹ <S%H7607><s%> unto his kinsman הַקָּרֹ֥ב <S%H7138><s%> that is next אֵלָ֛יו <S%H413><s%> in מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <S%H4940><s%> to him of his family וְיָרַ֣שׁ <S%H3423><s%> and he shall possess אֹתָ֑הּ <S%H853><s%> וְֽהָ֨יְתָ֜ה <S%H1961><s%> become לִבְנֵ֤י <S%H1121><s%> it and it shall be unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לְחֻקַּ֣ת <S%H2708><s%> a statute מִשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> of judgment כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> Moses ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses עֲלֵ֛ה <S%H5927><s%> Get thee up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> into this mount הָעֲבָרִ֖ים <S%H5682><s%> Abarim הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> to this וּרְאֵה֙ <S%H7200><s%> and see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which נָתַ֖תִּי <S%H5414><s%> which I have given לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְרָאִ֣יתָה <S%H7200><s%> And when thou hast seen אֹתָ֔הּ <S%H853><s%> וְנֶאֱסַפְתָּ֥ <S%H622><s%> it thou also shalt be gathered אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to עַמֶּ֖יךָ <S%H5971><s%> unto thy people גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> too אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> you כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> after נֶאֱסַ֖ף <S%H622><s%> was gathered אַהֲרֹ֥ן <S%H175><s%> as Aaron אָחִֽיךָ׃ <S%H251><s%> thy brother

כַּאֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> you מְרִיתֶ֨ם <S%H4784><s%> For ye rebelled פִּ֜י <S%H6310><s%> against my commandment בְּמִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the desert צִ֗ן <S%H6790><s%> of Zin בִּמְרִיבַת֙ <S%H4808><s%> in the strife הָֽעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> of the congregation לְהַקְדִּישֵׁ֥נִי <S%H6942><s%> to sanctify בַמַּ֖יִם <S%H4325><s%> me at the water לְעֵינֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H5869><s%> before their eyes הֵ֛ם <S%H1992><s%> מֵֽי־ <S%H4325><s%> that [is] the water מְרִיבַ֥ת <S%H4809><s%> of Meribah קָדֵ֖שׁ <S%H6946><s%> in Kadesh מִדְבַּר־ <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness צִֽן׃ <S%H6790><s%> of Zin פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <S%H1696><s%> spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> saying

יִפְקֹ֣ד <S%H6485><s%> set יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Let the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> the God הָרוּחֹ֖ת <S%H7307><s%> of the spirits לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> of all בָּשָׂ֑ר <S%H1320><s%> of all flesh אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> over the congregation

אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who יֵצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> Which may go out לִפְנֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> and who יָבֹא֙ <S%H935><s%> them and which may go in לִפְנֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H6440><s%> before וַאֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which יוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <S%H3318><s%> them and which may lead them out וַאֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> who יְבִיאֵ֑ם <S%H935><s%> and which may bring them in וְלֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> not תִהְיֶה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> that the congregation יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כַּצֹּ֕אן <S%H6629><s%> be not as sheep אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵין־ <S%H369><s%> have לָהֶ֖ם רֹעֶֽה׃ <S%H7462><s%> which have no shepherd

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> said יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses קַח־ <S%H3947><s%> Take לְךָ֙ אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֣עַ <S%H3091><s%> thee Joshua בִּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נ֔וּן <S%H5126><s%> of Nun אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> a man אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> whom ר֣וּחַ <S%H7307><s%> in whom [is] the spirit בּ֑וֹ וְסָמַכְתָּ֥ <S%H5564><s%> and lay אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדְךָ֖ <S%H3027><s%> thine hand עָלָֽיו׃ <S%H5921><s%> and

וְהַֽעֲמַדְתָּ֣ <S%H5975><s%> And set אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> him before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָ֑ה <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation וְצִוִּיתָ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> and give him a charge אֹת֖וֹ <S%H853><s%> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <S%H5869><s%> in their sight

וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <S%H5414><s%> And thou shalt put מֵהֽוֹדְךָ֖ <S%H1935><s%> [some] of thine honour עָלָ֑יו <S%H5921><s%> on לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> order יִשְׁמְע֔וּ <S%H8085><s%> may be obedient כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֖ת <S%H5712><s%> upon him that all the congregation בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

וְלִפְנֵ֨י <S%H6440><s%> before אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵן֙ <S%H3548><s%> the priest יַעֲמֹ֔ד <S%H5975><s%> And he shall stand וְשָׁ֥אַל <S%H7592><s%> who shall ask ל֛וֹ בְּמִשְׁפַּ֥ט <S%H4941><s%> [counsel] for him after the judgment הָאוּרִ֖ים <S%H224><s%> of Urim לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> At פִּ֨יו <S%H6310><s%> at his word יֵצְא֜וּ <S%H3318><s%> shall they go out וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> out פִּ֣יו <S%H6310><s%> and at his word יָבֹ֗אוּ <S%H935><s%> they shall come in ה֛וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> [both] he and all the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֥ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel אִתּ֖וֹ <S%H854><s%> even וְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> with him even all the congregation

וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> did מֹשֶׁ֔ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD אֹת֑וֹ <S%H853><s%> וַיִּקַּ֣ח <S%H3947><s%> him and he took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹשֻׁ֗עַ <S%H3091><s%> Joshua וַיַּֽעֲמִדֵ֙הוּ֙ <S%H5975><s%> and set לִפְנֵי֙ <S%H6440><s%> him before אֶלְעָזָ֣ר <S%H499><s%> Eleazar הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest וְלִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> and before כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָעֵדָֽה׃ <S%H5712><s%> all the congregation

וַיִּסְמֹ֧ךְ <S%H5564><s%> And he laid אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יָדָ֛יו <S%H3027><s%> his hands עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> on וַיְצַוֵּ֑הוּ <S%H6680><s%> upon him and gave him a charge כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> as the LORD בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> of Moses פ
